name: Beals et ux., Appellants, v. Robertson et ux.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Beals et ux., Appellants, v. Robertson et ux.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The Decree of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Arnold of the Superior Court; costs to be paid by the appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Charles E. Body, with him Leland W. Walker and Uhl, Ealy & Uhl, for appellants.
Frank 8. Lucente, with him Boose, Coffroth & Boose, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Beals et ux., Appellants, v. Robertson et ux.
Argued March 24, 1947.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Charles E. Body, with him Leland W. Walker and Uhl, Ealy & Uhl, for appellants.
Frank 8. Lucente, with him Boose, Coffroth & Boose, for appellees.
April 14, 1947:
